FuncDef: This command specifies a SAP egress QoS policy that is used to reclassify the forwarding class and profile of egress routed packets on the VPLS service. When routed packets associated with the IP interface egress a VPLS SAP, the reclassification rules within the sap-egress QoS policy applied to the SAP are always ignored (even when reclassify-using-qos is not defined).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the SAP egress QoS policy ID This parameter is required when executing the reclassify-using-qos command. The specified SAP egress QoS ID must exist within the system or the command fails.
